chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: In the foo and the bar and the foobar

sect1.title: A section in the first chapter
sect1.para: All I need is a single paragraph of text to make the section valid.

appendix.title: Remaining details
appendix.para: Although this booklet is quite complete, here I will mention some detail I never got to.

sect1.title: Use of the word dude
sect1.para: Here's an example of how to dude: DUDE.
